channel.title: Removing a server off the status checker list?
channel.description:
Again, I can't seem to find the right places for these kinds of questions...
Anyways, I'd like to have my server removed off of MoparScape Status Checker because none of the players on my server even vote for us. I can't find where to delete it anywhere but if someone could help me out or if a staff member could delete it for me that would be great.
Regards, Simplicity
(Server Name: Simplicity 562)

item.title: Removing a server off the status checker list?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

We don’t delete servers from the server status, and we don’t allow requests to delete servers from the server status, just wait for your server to drop below 40%.

Read full topic
item.source: Removing a server off the status checker list?
